column5: Bid Now, time's a runnin out  Punkin Chunker
Ummm...will kids fit in it?? LOL
Can we use it to chum for Carp??
I just wonder how much call there is for Punkin Chunkers?  Maybe our southern contingency knows!!!
Ooooh I need one of those!!  Just think how far that thing would toss the neighborhood cats!!!!
Not to mention dwarfies. If you aim it right, I could be at the beer store in nano seconds....
Talk about "something that's just wrong" Joey I was dangerous enough with a regular slingshot.
Having lived in Delaware and having attended several punkin chunken World Championships . Don't knock till You try it .  http://www.punkinchunkin.com/images/galler...lomew/index.htm

Only in America!!! Lived in the USA for 2 years. Used to think to myself if you can't buy "it" here in America, then "they" just don't make it. Anywhere.  Thought at the time that was a good thing, by the way. Wouldn't want  to start any international incidents!!!!  Lived in New Orleans actually. A fantastic city filled with wonderful, welcoming people. What happened there after Hurricane Katrina, (and what continues to Not happen) is just wrong.  When i lived there, any excuse to have a "Festival" was a good one. Now people are lucky to have a roof over their heads.
And if your punkin chucker craps out on ya, maybe you'll want one of these. LUCKY BANGLE
Wow, and only $500,000 starting bid, or buy it now for the low low price of $9,999,999.00. Simply amazing Dan, simply amazing.  It must really work  Joey
